thread.section_title: PACK & SEND Australia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PACK & SEND Australia | www.packsend.com.au
thread.title: Philip Le Bas
thread.title_full: PACK & SEND Australia reviewed by Philip Le Bas

author: Philip Le Bas
title: Philip Le Bas
text: If your'e happy to do the process online for your o/s parcel, then P&S is a safe way to go. They will also assist you at one of their outlets, which will cost more and use DHL as their shipper, which makes tracking easy - if you want parcel pickup they will do that to. You will also get a more competitive rate than going through DHL directly. P&S were also a cheaper option than using Australia Post . Be aware of supplying copies of all relevant documentation so that your parcel doesn't get stuck in Customs like mine did in the destination country (Germany). If you don't have tracking like you do with P&S's service, then you've got no idea what is going on and the parcel will eventually return to sender !!
